params.amountAdd0: The amount of token0 to add.
params.amountAdd1: The amount of token1 to add.
params.tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

params._GHOAmount: The amount of GHO to withdraw.
params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

closePosition(uint256).details: The caller must have approved the transfer of the Uniswap V3 NFT from the BorrowerOperations contract to their wallet.

params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

openPosition(uint256).details: The caller must have approved the transfer of the Uniswap V3 NFT from their wallet to the BorrowerOperations contract.

params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._liquidityToRemove: The amount of liquidity to remove.
params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._GHOAmount: The amount of GHO to repay.
params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap V3 NFT representing the position.

setAddresses(address,address,address).details: This function can only be called by the contract owner.
